description:
You find yourself on an abandoned space station, which has turned into a real hell after a failed scientific experiment. Infected zombies, which appeared as a result of the experiment, filled the corridors and compartments... Your only task is to survive and escape!

You are the only survivor who remains human among countless hordes of different zombies. Each type of zombie has its own unique characteristics, which requires you to adapt and use your own tactics in each battle. You have a wide selection of weapons in your arsenal, including both melee melee weapons and long-range firearms.

Explore dangerous corridors, look for cover and make your way to the exit among crowds of zombies. Prepare for a challenge full of thrills and show what you can do as you face zombies in the void of space!

GAME FEATURES:
▪ Many different levels with dangerous zombies;
▪ Large arsenal of weapons for every taste;
▪ Various types of zombies.
name: Zombie Attack: Zombies Survival Shooter
intro: Zombie apocalypse action that will keep you on your toes and challenge your survival skills. Your task is to survive and escape!
